events.message: I have filed a claim after my car was involved in a collision with another vehicle at the intersection yesterday afternoon.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the submitted initial report and related details.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle your auto accident claim and will contact you shortly to discuss next steps.
Your claim has been officially acknowledged, and we appreciate you providing timely information regarding the collision.
Please submit the police report, photographs of vehicle damage, and any medical reports related to your injuries for further processing.
All requested documents including photos, police report, and medical bills have been submitted successfully through the online portal.
Our investigation team has begun assessing the details and circumstances of the auto accident to determine liability and damages.
The investigation into your vehicle collision has been completed, confirming the other driver was at fault.
We have proposed a settlement offer to cover your vehicle repairs and related medical expenses resulting from the accident.
Thank you for your positive feedback regarding the prompt handling and clear communication throughout your claim process.
Your auto accident claim has been approved following full review and acceptance of the settlement terms.
The approved settlement amount has been processed and payment issued to your designated bank account today.
Your claim file has been officially closed, and we thank you for your cooperation and patience throughout this process.
All documentation and correspondence related to your auto accident claim have been archived securely for future reference if needed.
